onlyHelper.name: OnlyHelper
onlyHelper.desc: Assistente e ferramentas para otimizar seu dia a dia na OnlyFlow. Automa√ß√µes, atalhos e suporte integrado.

onlyHelper.intro: Seu site recebe visitas. Sua equipe quer atender bem. O que falta √© a ponte: um canal direto, em tempo real, sem e-mail perdido e sem fila na m√£o. O OnlyHelper √© essa ponte ‚Äî uma plataforma de comunica√ß√£o multicanal para voc√™ colocar suporte por chat no seu site, com fila organizada, hist√≥rico e gest√£o simples.
onlyHelper.problemTitle: O problema que a gente resolve
onlyHelper.problem: Visitantes desistem quando precisam preencher formul√°rio ou esperar resposta por e-mail. Atendentes perdem tempo entre abas, planilhas e "quem pegou esse ticket?". Gestores n√£o sabem quem est√° na fila, em que assunto, e quem est√° atendendo. O OnlyHelper organiza tudo: um bot√£o no site, uma fila em tempo real, um chat com hist√≥rico e uma tela de gest√£o para quem manda no time.
onlyHelper.howStep1: No site do seu cliente ‚Äî Um bot√£o de suporte (embed) aparece na p√°gina. O visitante clica.
onlyHelper.howStep2: Escolha do assunto ‚Äî Ele v√™ os assuntos configurados (ex.: Vendas, Suporte t√©cnico, Financeiro) e escolhe um. Isso j√° cria o ticket e coloca ele na fila certa.
onlyHelper.howStep3: Na fila ‚Äî Quem tem aquele assunto na equipe v√™ o visitante na fila, em tempo real. Um atendente clica em "Assumir" e o ticket passa a ser dele.
onlyHelper.howStep4: No chat ‚Äî Visitante e atendente conversam por mensagens. D√° para enviar imagens (anexos). Tudo fica salvo no hist√≥rico do ticket.
onlyHelper.howStep5: Encerramento ‚Äî Quando acabar, o atendente encerra o ticket. Se o visitante voltar depois, pode abrir um novo atendimento e escolher o assunto de novo.
onlyHelper.howClosing: Tudo isso em um √∫nico painel: fila, atendimentos ativos e chat, atualizando na hora.
onlyHelper.forVisitor: Para o visitante: Bot√£o no site, escolha de assunto, chat em tempo real, anexos, posi√ß√£o na fila.
onlyHelper.forAttendant: Para o atendente: Fila por assunto, assumir ticket, chat com hist√≥rico e anexos, encerrar ticket.
onlyHelper.forCollaborator: Para o colaborador: Seus atendimentos, status (Dispon√≠vel/Ocupado/Ausente), resumo na home.
onlyHelper.forAdmin: Para o administrador: CRUD de assuntos, gest√£o de colaboradores, controle de quem v√™ o qu√™.
onlyHelper.tech: Tecnologia: WebSocket em tempo real, sess√£o do visitante, autentica√ß√£o, interface responsiva.
onlyHelper.benefits: Um clique no site ‚Ä¢ Fila viva por assunto ‚Ä¢ Chat com anexo ‚Ä¢ Assuntos no centro ‚Ä¢ Vis√£o na home em tempo real ‚Ä¢ Gest√£o sem caos.
onlyHelper.forWho: Empresas que querem suporte r√°pido no site; equipes que precisam de fila e chat em um s√≥ lugar; gestores que querem controle por assunto; sites que desejam bot√£o de suporte integrado (embed).
onlyHelper.why: Suporte que conversa vende e fideliza. N√£o √© s√≥ ticket ou e-mail: √© chat, fila e assunto certo na hora certa. O OnlyHelper junta simplicidade e organiza√ß√£o para n√£o perder nenhuma conversa.
onlyHelper.who: O OnlyHelper √© o produto. Quem desenvolve e mant√©m √© a OnlyFlow. No site e no painel voc√™ v√™ "Developed by OnlyFlow" no rodap√©.

faq.label: Perguntas frequentes
faq.title: Tire suas d√∫vidas sobre a plataforma.
faq.q1: A OnlyFlow est√° em conformidade com a LGPD?
faq.a1: Sim. Seguimos as diretrizes da LGPD, tratamos dados com base em bases legais adequadas e oferecemos transpar√™ncia sobre uso e revoga√ß√£o de consentimento.
faq.q2: Existem limites de disparo em massa?
faq.a2: Cada plano possui limites e controles de velocidade para evitar bloqueios, mas voc√™ pode contratar volumes adicionais conforme a necessidade.
faq.a3: Sim. Oferecemos um per√≠odo de trial gratuito de 7 dias com recursos ilimitados para que voc√™ valide a solu√ß√£o no seu dia a dia.
faq.a4: Trabalhamos com integra√ß√µes nativas (WhatsApp, Instagram, OpenAI, Typebot, Google, CRMs, ERPs) e qualquer sistema com API REST ou webhooks.
faq.q5: Os dados ficam em servidores no Brasil?
faq.a5: Sim! Toda a infraestrutura da OnlyFlow est√° hospedada em servidores no Brasil (AWS S√£o Paulo), garantindo baixa lat√™ncia e conformidade total com regulamenta√ß√µes locais. Fazemos backups di√°rios criptografados e mantemos redund√¢ncia em m√∫ltiplas zonas de disponibilidade.
faq.q6: Como funciona o setup do agente de IA?
faq.a6: √â muito simples! Voc√™ escolhe uma persona (vendedor, suporte, etc.), personaliza as respostas base, define o tom de voz e pronto. N√£o precisa programar nada. O agente aprende com as conversas e voc√™ pode ajustar as respostas a qualquer momento pelo painel. Tamb√©m oferecemos templates prontos para come√ßar em minutos.

hero.title: Multi-channel communication automation and management
hero.description: OnlyFlow is an automation and communication management platform that centralizes WhatsApp, Instagram and other channels in a single environment. Automate customer service, manage customer relationships and run campaigns at scale.

about.label: About the application
about.title: Everything you need to centralize your conversations in one place.
about.description1: OnlyFlow is a platform created for companies that need to automate customer service, manage customer relationships and run communication campaigns at scale. Connect multiple WhatsApp, Instagram and other channel accounts, create AI agents, build visual workflows and organize everything in the Kanban CRM.
about.description2: Also available in native apps for iOS and Android, with biometric authentication and real-time synchronization.
about.integrationsDesc: OnlyFlow connects to various services to offer a complete solution. All permissions are used exclusively for the functionalities described below.
about.google: Google (Sheets and Drive): lead synchronization with spreadsheets and file storage.
about.meta: Meta (Instagram): automations in DMs, comments and message sequences.
about.openai: OpenAI: AI agents, contextual responses and audio transcription.
about.typebot: Typebot: external chatbots connected to MindOnlyFlow.
about.whatsapp: WhatsApp: multiple instances, groups and conversation history.

onlyHelper.name: OnlyHelper
onlyHelper.desc: Assistant and tools to optimize your daily workflow on OnlyFlow. Automations, shortcuts and integrated support.

onlyHelper.intro: Your site gets visitors. Your team wants to serve them well. What's missing is the bridge: a direct, real-time channel‚Äîno lost emails, no queue in hand. OnlyHelper is that bridge‚Äîa multi-channel communication platform to put chat support on your site, with an organized queue, history, and simple management.
onlyHelper.problem: Visitors give up when they have to fill out a form or wait for an email reply. Agents waste time switching tabs, spreadsheets, and "who took that ticket?". Managers don't know who's in the queue, on what topic, or who's handling it. OnlyHelper organizes everything: a button on the site, a real-time queue, a chat with history, and a management screen for the team lead.
onlyHelper.howTitle: How it works (from visitor to closure)
onlyHelper.howStep1: On your client's site ‚Äî A support button (embed) appears on the page. The visitor clicks.
onlyHelper.howStep2: Choose topic ‚Äî They see the configured topics (e.g. Sales, Technical support, Billing) and pick one. That creates the ticket and puts them in the right queue.
onlyHelper.howStep3: In the queue ‚Äî Whoever handles that topic on the team sees the visitor in the queue in real time. An agent clicks "Take" and the ticket is theirs.
onlyHelper.howStep4: In the chat ‚Äî Visitor and agent chat by message. They can send images (attachments). Everything is saved in the ticket history.
onlyHelper.howStep5: Closure ‚Äî When done, the agent closes the ticket. If the visitor returns later, they can open a new session and choose the topic again.
onlyHelper.howClosing: All in one dashboard: queue, active sessions, and chat, updating in real time.
onlyHelper.forVisitor: For the visitor: Support button on site, topic choice, real-time chat, attachments, position in queue.
onlyHelper.forAttendant: For the agent: Queue by topic, take ticket, chat with history and attachments, close ticket.
onlyHelper.forCollaborator: For the collaborator: Your sessions, status (Available/Busy/Away), summary on home.
onlyHelper.forAdmin: For the administrator: CRUD for topics, collaborator management, control of who sees what.
onlyHelper.tech: Technology: Real-time WebSocket, visitor session, authentication, responsive interface.
onlyHelper.benefits: One click on site ‚Ä¢ Live queue by topic ‚Ä¢ Chat with attachments ‚Ä¢ Topics at the center ‚Ä¢ Real-time home view ‚Ä¢ Management without chaos.
onlyHelper.forWho: Companies that want fast support on their site; teams that need queue and chat in one place; managers who want control by topic; sites that want an integrated support button (embed).
onlyHelper.why: Support that talks sells and retains. It's not just tickets or email: it's chat, queue, and the right topic at the right time. OnlyHelper brings together simplicity and organization so you don't miss any conversation.
onlyHelper.who: OnlyHelper is the product. OnlyFlow develops and maintains it. On the site and in the panel you see "Developed by OnlyFlow" in the footer.

testimonials.description: Automate WhatsApp, reduce response time and increase sales with a platform built for scale.
testimonials.testimonial1: OnlyFlow revolutionized our customer service. We increased sales by 40% just by automating the first contact with AI.
testimonials.testimonial2: Bulk messaging without blocks and integrated CRM. We replaced three tools with a single solution.
testimonials.testimonial3: We integrated with our system in less than 2 hours. The API is well documented and support is excellent.
testimonials.testimonial4: We use it for customer onboarding. The AI agent answers 80% of questions automatically. Game changer!
testimonials.testimonial5: Real-time webhooks work perfectly. The delivery reliability is impressive. 99.9% uptime.

faq.label: Frequently asked questions
faq.title: Get your questions about the platform answered.
faq.a1: Yes. We follow LGPD guidelines, process data based on appropriate legal bases and offer transparency about use and consent revocation.
faq.a2: Each plan has limits and speed controls to prevent blocks, but you can purchase additional volumes as needed.
faq.a3: Yes. We offer a 7-day free trial with unlimited resources so you can validate the solution in your daily routine.
faq.a4: We work with native integrations (WhatsApp, Instagram, OpenAI, Typebot, Google, CRMs, ERPs) and any system with REST API or webhooks.
faq.q5: Is data hosted on servers in Brazil?
faq.a5: Yes! All OnlyFlow infrastructure is hosted on servers in Brazil (AWS S√£o Paulo), ensuring low latency and full compliance with local regulations. We perform daily encrypted backups and maintain redundancy across multiple availability zones.
faq.q6: How does the AI agent setup work?
faq.a6: It's very simple! You choose a persona (salesperson, support, etc.), customize the base responses, set the tone of voice, and you're done. No coding required. The agent learns from conversations and you can adjust responses at any time from the dashboard. We also offer ready-made templates to get started in minutes.

docs.title: API Documentation
docs.description: Webhooks, message sending, CRM and group management.
docs.authIntro: All requests must include the authentication token in the Authorization header.
docs.authTokenNote: The token is unique per instance and can be found on the instance card on the Connections Manager page.
docs.sendTextDesc: Sends a text message to a contact.
docs.sendImageDesc: Sends an image with optional caption.
docs.sendVideoDesc: Sends a video with optional caption.
docs.sendAudioDesc: Sends an audio to a contact.
docs.moveContactDesc: Moves a contact from one column to another in the Kanban.
docs.useShortId: Use short_id (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) for convenience. See columns in GET /columns
docs.listContactsDesc: Returns all contacts for the instance.
docs.listContactsResponse: Response: status, count, contacts (id, phone, name, profilePicture, columnId, unreadCount, lastMessage, lastMessageAt)
docs.listColumnsDesc: Returns all columns with id, shortId (1-5), name, order, color.
docs.groupsIntro: Manage WhatsApp groups: list, create, update name/description/picture, settings, invite code, mention everyone, leave group.
docs.importantPhone: Phone format: Numbers only, with country code (e.g. 5511999999999).
docs.importantUrls: Media URLs: Must be public and accessible.
docs.importantShortIdCols: Short ID columns: Use 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 instead of UUIDs.
docs.importantToken: Token: Unique per instance, permanent until the instance is deleted.
docs.importantRealtime: Updates: Changes via API are reflected on the frontend via WebSocket.

status.title: Platform Status
status.description: Track in real time the status of OnlyFlow's main services.
status.error: Could not load platform status. Please try again in a few moments.
status.someIssues: Some services may be experiencing instability. Check details below.
status.noServices: No services returned by status API.
